biotools.summary:
A software package for analysing continuously measured glucose levels in epidemiology.

GLU: A tool for analysing continuously measured glucose in epidemiology.

GLU is described in the paper: L.A.C. Millard et al. GLU: A tool for analysing continuously measured glucose in epidemiology, bioRxiv, 2018.

GLU is a tool for analysing continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) data in epidemiology.
